TA0033.title: Cross-border Criminal Organizations
TA0033.description: Cross-border criminal organizations are organized cybercrime gangs operating illegal activities across multiple countries and regions, exploiting regulatory differences and law enforcement cooperation difficulties between jurisdictions to evade crackdowns. Main activities include: cross-border telecom fraud, cryptocurrency money laundering, cross-border fake orders and fraudulent transactions, illegal fund transfers through cross-border payment channels, and cross-border counterfeiting and smuggling.
